dict.acceptation: 垃圾；无意义的东西；废话；劣质的东西；
<英澳·非正>把…说得一钱不值，贬损…；轻视，蔑视；消灭，销毁；

sent.orig: If rubbish box is more, just on the street rubbish can be little some.
sent.trans: 要是垃圾箱多一些的话，街上的垃圾就会少些。

sent.orig: Pitch the rubbish into the rubbish box.
We should throw the rubbish into the rubbish can.
sent.trans: 我们应当将垃圾扔进垃圾箱。

sent.orig: Empty rubbish bin, wash out with soapy water and then place plastic bags in rubbish bins.
sent.trans: 倒垃圾桶并用肥皂水洗净垃圾桶，然后把垃圾袋罩在垃圾桶内。

sent.orig: Zhang Hai put the rubbish in the rubbish bin.
sent.trans: 张海把垃圾倒进了垃圾箱。
